items.title: Awesome Choo Updates on Aug 24, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / Dependencies

*   [nanomorph (‚≠ê743)](https://github.com/choojs/nanomorph) - Hyper fast diffing algorithm for real DOM nodes.
*   [nanorouter (‚≠ê116)](https://github.com/choojs/nanorouter) - Smol frontend router.
*   [nanobus (‚≠ê228)](https://github.com/choojs/nanobus) - Tiny message bus.
*   [nanolocation (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/choojs/nanolocation) - Small window\.location library.
*   [nanohref (‚≠ê41)](https://github.com/choojs/nanohref) - Tiny href click handler library.
*   [nanoquery (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/choojs/nanoquery) - Tiny querystring module.
*   [nanotiming (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/choojs/nanotiming) - Small timing library.
items.content_html:
Contents / Dependencies

  • nanomorph (‚≠ê743) - Hyper fast diffing algorithm for real DOM nodes.
  • nanorouter (‚≠ê116) - Smol frontend router.
  • nanobus (‚≠ê228) - Tiny message bus.
  • nanolocation (‚≠ê10) - Small window.location library.
  • nanohref (‚≠ê41) - Tiny href click handler library.
  • nanoquery (‚≠ê49) - Tiny querystring module.
  • nanotiming (‚≠ê35) - Small timing library.

items.title: Awesome Choo Updates on Feb 16, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / Plugins and addons

*   [choo-pull (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo-pull) - Wrap handlers to use pull-stream in a choo plugin.
*   [choo-redirect (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo-redirect) - Redirect a view to another view.
*   [choo-model (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo-model) - Experimental state management lib for choo.
*   [choo-resume (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/bengourley/choo-resume) - choo-resume + hot-rld = hot app reload in choo.
items.content_html:
Contents / Plugins and addons

  • choo-pull (‚≠ê15) - Wrap handlers to use pull-stream in a choo plugin.
  • choo-redirect (‚≠ê19) - Redirect a view to another view.
  • choo-model (‚≠ê14) - Experimental state management lib for choo.
  • choo-resume (‚≠ê15) - choo-resume + hot-rld = hot app reload in choo.

items.title: Awesome Choo Updates on Aug 09, 2016
items.content_text:
### Contents / Official resources

*   [Docs (‚≠ê6.8k)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo/blob/master/README.md)
*   [Handbook (‚≠ê269)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo-handbook)
*   [Repo (‚≠ê6.8k)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo)
*   [Twitter thread](https://twitter.com/yoshuawuyts/status/730087077803528193)

### Contents / Dependencies

*   [bel (‚≠ê684)](https://github.com/shama/bel) - Create composable DOM elements using
    template strings.
*   [hyperx (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/substack/hyperx) - Convert template strings to
    library backends.
*   [nanoraf](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/nanoraf) - Only call RAF when needed.

### Contents / Demos

*   [Input example](http://requirebin.com/?gist=e589473373b3100a6ace29f7bbee3186) - ([repo (‚≠ê6.8k)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo/tree/master/examples/title))
*   [HTTP effects](https://hyperdev.com/#!/project/fork-fang)
*   [Mailbox routing (‚≠ê6.8k)](https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/choo/tree/master/examples/mailbox)
*   [TodoMVC](http://shuheikagawa.com/todomvc-choo) - ([repo (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/shuhei/todomvc-choo))
*   [Grow](https://grow.static.land) - ([repo (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/sethvincent/grow))
*   [Chatbot](http://chootbot.herokuapp.com) - ([repo (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/plaey/chatbot))

### Contents / Community

*   [Freenode](https://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=choo)

### Contents / Resources

*   :movie\_camera: [TCBY community live hangout](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a97Mw2z1SAI)
*   :book: [A better frontend experience](https://medium.com/@yoshuawuyts/a-better-frontend-experience-7b0498c85658)
*   :book: [Composition in CycleJS, choo, React and Angular2](http://blog.krawaller.se/posts/composition-in-cyclejs-choo-react-and-angular2)
*   :book: [Stupidly smart components in choo](http://blog.krawaller.se/posts/stupidly-smart-components-in-choo)

### Contents / Projects using choo

*   [boxcar (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/toddself/boxcar) - A choo-based grid/spreadsheet editor.
*   [choo-sortable (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/willkessler/choo-sortable) - Building sortable code with choo.
*   [hacker-choo (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/mw222rs/hacker-choo) - Hacker Typer clone written in choo.
*   [footprint-rechoo (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/npeihl/footprint-rechoo) - A choo rewrite of [footprint-review](http://github.com/sjcgis/footprint-review).
*   [minidocs (‚≠ê137)](https://github.com/freeman-lab/minidocs) ‚Äì A documentation site generator built with choo.
*   [dataface (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/timwis/dataface) - Desktop application to manage databases.
*   [BlankUp (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/HoverBaum/BlankUp-Electron) - Multiplatform markdown editor.
items.content_html:
Contents / Official resources

  • Docs (‚≠ê6.8k)
  • Handbook (‚≠ê269)
  • Repo (‚≠ê6.8k)
  • Twitter thread

Contents / Dependencies

  • bel (‚≠ê684) - Create composable DOM elements using template strings.
  • hyperx (‚≠ê1k) - Convert template strings to library backends.
  • nanoraf - Only call RAF when needed.

Contents / Demos

  • Input example - (repo (‚≠ê6.8k))
  • HTTP effects
  • Mailbox routing (‚≠ê6.8k)
  • TodoMVC - (repo (‚≠ê37))
  • Grow - (repo (‚≠ê13))
  • Chatbot - (repo (‚≠ê2))

Contents / Community

  • Freenode

Contents / Resources

  • üé• TCBY community live hangout
  • üìñ A better frontend experience
  • üìñ Composition in CycleJS, choo, React and Angular2
  • üìñ Stupidly smart components in choo

Contents / Projects using choo

  • boxcar (‚≠ê10) - A choo-based grid/spreadsheet editor.
  • choo-sortable (‚≠ê2) - Building sortable code with choo.
  • hacker-choo (‚≠ê11) - Hacker Typer clone written in choo.
  • footprint-rechoo (‚≠ê4) - A choo rewrite of footprint-review.
  • minidocs (‚≠ê137) ‚Äì A documentation site generator built with choo.
  • dataface (‚≠ê43) - Desktop application to manage databases.
  • BlankUp (‚≠ê37) - Multiplatform markdown editor.
